Frizzy

Reusable UI component library for Airfrov web.

Buttons

Neutral

Sebelumnya (Anchor)

Inline text will line up with anchor elements differently than buttons. The width of the anchor version will be according to the length of its inner text: Sebelumnya (Anchor)

Negative

Tidak (Anchor)

Inline text will line up with anchor elements differently than buttons. The width of the anchor version will be according to the length of its inner text: Tidak

Positive

Berikutnya (Anchor)

Inline text will line up with anchor elements differently than buttons. The width of the anchor version will be according to the length of its inner text: Berikutnya

Notice

Ongkir bervariasi tergantung jarak dari lokasi Traveller yang memesan Go-Send dan akan dibayarkan oleh requester saat driver Gojek memberikan barang request
Have you included the appropriate sales taxes (e.g. 9%) for purchases from the United States in the amount you are willing to pay to travellers?

Warning

Ini tidak dapat lagi dilakukan pada versi aplikasi ini. Silahkan update aplikasi melalui App Store atau Google Play.
Oops... We improved our app so that Travellers can now deliver straight to Requesters, it will be a faster and easier process for everyone! Update now!
